attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in the political leadership.  We want another election.
attributes.additional_details: Look at the world around you, did postal voting cause electoral fraud in benefit of the current government ?
attributes.background:
The current government seem to have sold assets to freinds and party donors.  The country is ROTTING due to mismanagement and ideological politics means our ex services are left to fend for themselves while our leaders line their own pockets.

#BETRAYED

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106407

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
